content: Hello! Thanks for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. My name is Sam, and I can help you book a service appointment. To get started, may I have your name, please?
My name is Mr. Marcus Raines.
Thank you, Mr. Raines. Can you provide the address where you need the service?
It's 8013 Misty Pines Road, Maple Falls.
Thank you. To confirm, you need plumbing service at 8013 Misty Pines Road, Maple Falls. One moment while I check our service area.

I'm sorry, but it appears that 8013 Misty Pines Road in Maple Falls is outside our service area. Unfortunately, we won't be able to schedule an appointment at that address. If you have another address within our coverage area, please let me know, or feel free to reach out if you have any questions. Thank you for considering XYZ Home Services.
